item.title: TIL How Network Time Protocol Works
item.description: Network Time Protocol So today I watched a talk on NTP and it was amazing. I will do my best to summarise the core parts in this post. What is it? Network Time Protocol allows clocks between computers to be synchronised over the internet or local area network. It was developed by [David L. Mills] (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_L._Mills) in 1985 and is currently in its fourth version. Accurate to a few milliseconds of Coordinated Universal Time, NTP is a fundamental instrument in modern networking.
